src:
Kecelakaan di Tol Kuningan Jaksel, Lalin Padat
02 Nov 2019, 22:20 by Audrey Santoso
Jakarta - Sebuah kecelakaan terjadi di KM 5 Tol Kuningan, Jakarta Selatan. Kecelakaan itu terjadi di ruas tol yang mengarah ke Cawang, Jakarta Timur.
"(Kecelakaan) di KM 5 Tol Dalam Kota ke arah Cawang. Untuk saat ini sudah selesai penanganan," kata petugas call center PT Jasa Marga, Daus, ketika dikonfirmasi detikcom, Sabtu (2/11/2019).
Titik kecelakaan, lanjut Daus, tepatnya di jalan layang. Akibat peristiwa ini, terjadi kepadatan arus lalu lintas sepanjang 500 meter menuju lokasi kecelakaan.
"Posisinya di layang Kuningan, di lajur tengah atau lajur 2. Imbasnya kurang lebih 500 meter ke belakang," jelas Daus.
Jasa Marga mencatat kecelakaan terjadi pukul 21.46 WIB. Hingga selesai penanganan, tambah Daud, pihaknya belum mendapat informasi jumlah dan jenis kendaraan yang terlibat kecelakaan serta nasib penumpang di dalamnya.

(aud/fdu)
text:
Accident in Kuningan South Jakarta Toll Road, Solid Traffic
02 Nov 2019, 22:20 by Audrey Santoso
Jakarta - An accident occurred at KM 5 Tol Kuningan, South Jakarta. The accident occurred on the toll road that leads to Cawang, East Jakarta.
"(Accident) in KM 5 Toll in the City towards Cawang. For now, handling has been completed," said call center officer PT Jasa Marga, Daus, when confirmed detikcom, Saturday (11/02/2019).
The point of accident, continued Daus, precisely on the overpass. As a result of this incident, there was a density of traffic flow along 500 meters to the accident site.
"Its position is in the Kuningan overpass, in the middle lane or lane 2. The impact is approximately 500 meters to the back," explained Daus.
Jasa Marga noted that the accident occurred at 21.46 WIB. Until completion of handling, added Daud, his party has not received information on the number and type of vehicles involved in the accident and the fate of the passengers in it.

(aud / fdu)
